comments:
I tried this on the declared integration build from 20050603 and from the very
latest (20050607)
To repro:
1.  Window | Preferences
2.  Expand the Web and XML section
3.  Note that there are *two* entries for XML Catalog (there should only be one;
if they are different, then they need different names)
4.  Click on the first of the two XML Catalog items

Results:  multiple errors and a kind invitation to look at the log files for
more details.  The log file entries are below.

Expect:  only one XML Catalog item in the preferences and no errors when I click
on it
